info.name: No Ads, Bigger Art - CrackWatch - UPDATED
info.description: Makes game cover art larger (only works on larger screens with 1670+ pixel width). Only reason why it doesn't take up maximum screen space is because the art is often not very high res. Hides most - if not all - ads. Might break some things for paid users of the site.
info.additionalInfo: Updated: Since the IDs of the ad DIVs are randomized to avoid getting blocked, I had to hide the 3rd or so element to prevent the ads from being displayed. This works as of 5/22/2018, don't spam me if it breaks because of a change in the site, I can't control when CrackWatch decides to do some renovating to their site.
